greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if n is odd, otherwise a(n) = 2^(v-1)+1 where v is the 2-adic valuation of n (A007814(n)).
comment: Conjecture: a(n) is the height of the bottom region in column n of the Conant gasket in A328078.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 07 2020
